licence_overview:
If you act as an executry practitioner in Scotland, you must be registered with the [Council of the Law Society of Scotland.](http://www.lawscot.org.uk/ "Council of the Law Society of Scotland"){:rel="external"}

You must be a fit and proper person and comply with conduct and practice rules.

Registration will be subject to a fee.

Registration may be subject to conditions.
licence_short_description: Register with the Law Society of Scotland to act as an executry practitioner in Scotland.
overview: You need a register with the Law Society of Scotland to act as an executry practitioner in Scotland
title: Executry practitioner registration (Scotland)
will_continue_on: the Law Society of Scotland website
